Astronomy is the study of the universe. It is a very old subject that people have been interested in for thousands of years. Astronomers are scientists who try to learn as much as they can about the stars, planets, and galaxies. They use special tools like telescopes to help them see and study the universe. Others work in offices or even at home using computers to study the universe. There are many different types of astronomers. Some study the sun, while others study the stars that are far, far away.
